title: Bloomberg Markets: Corr on Trump's Latest North Korea Sanctions
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Corr on Trump's Latest North Korea Sanctions
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Anders Corr\u0010Founder\u0010Corr Analytics\u0010Discussing President Trump ordering ew sanctions on individuals, companies and banks doing business with North Korea as the U.S. increases pressure on Pyongyang for its weapons programs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
